Overview

This exercise is intended to highlight the fundamentals of building a DEM from raw topographic data.

Data and Materials for Exercises

Datasets

  • D_DEM.Zip D_DEM.Zip File of Data for this Exercise

Prerequisite for this Exercise

  • Some ArcGIS experience
  • ArcGIS 10.X w/ 3D Analyst Extension
  • Some familiarity with DEMs (e.g. Topic C.)

Step by Step

See this GIS Tutorial from Joe’s GIS Class
